com.facebook.buck.android.support.exopackage

Class ExopackageApplication<T extends ApplicationLike>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.facebook.buck.android.support.exopackage.ExopackageApplication<T>

  • public abstract class ExopackageApplication<T extends ApplicationLike>
extends Application
    A base class for implementing an Application that delegates to an ApplicationLike instance. This is used in conjunction with secondary dex files so that the logic that would normally live in the Application class is loaded after the secondary dexes are loaded.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExopackageApplication

        protected ExopackageApplication(boolean isExopackage)
        Parameters:
        isExopackage - True iff this is an exopackage build. This should usually be BuildConfig.IS_EXOPACKAGE.

      • ExopackageApplication

        protected ExopackageApplication(String delegateClassName,
                     boolean isExopackage)
        Parameters:
        delegateClassName - The fully-qualified name of the ApplicationLike class that will act as the delegate for application lifecycle callbacks.
        isExopackage - True iff this is an exopackage build. This should usually be BuildConfig.IS_EXOPACKAGE.

    • Method Detail

      • onBaseContextAttached

        protected void onBaseContextAttached()
        Hook for sub-classes to run logic after the Application#attachBaseContext has been called but before the delegate is created. Implementors should be very careful what they do here since android.app.Application#onCreate will not have yet been called.

      • getDelegateIfPresent

        public final T getDelegateIfPresent()
        Returns:
        the delegate, or null if not set up.
